description._content: Description: Part of the Naftak area at the Oil-Fields looking towards Chashm-i-Ali workshops seen in the distance. Description: The Comapny's Main Office building at Masjid-i-Sulaiman. Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/714 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
